reviewText: It didn't make any sense.  Gave it away and would not recommend to anyone.  It was very disappointing to me.

I guess there are people who think this (movie??) carried a message.  As for the rest of us, if we weren't invested in our country, we probably wouldn't be one today.  I don't think playing cowboys and Indians and fighting the occasional kids battle influenced my decision to spend three years in Viet Nam.

If I ever had illusions about the "glories of battle" I lost them after watching Daniel Reeves' Smothering Dreams. Smothering Dreams (Home Use) We need to think very carefully before we send our people to war. Is it worth it?
